p: Finally, psychiatrists may have something to offer more broadly in the battle against misinformation. Social media enables rapid dissemination of misinformation and there are global funding deficits for public health communication [ 14]. Patients encountered by CL psychiatrists, including individuals with cognitive or psychiatric disorders, may be especially vulnerable to misinformation. Disseminating correct information to our professional and personal communities in an effective, psychologically astute way is of the utmost importance.
